entries.quest_location_d: 'Ahh... The Lucent Ivaya. A quiet quarter located in Ord Mantell Space frequented only by peace and the gentle hum of my ship's engine.'
entries.quest_patrol_d: 'It is my duty, as direct by my superior Laetin A'shera, to patrol the Lucent Ivaya Quadrant of Ord Mantell for any suspicious Black Sun activity. Laetin mentioned incoming unidentified ships. This usually wouldn't be a nuisance, but the Car'das intelligence ring suggests that a Black Sun Spy is posing as a peaceful miner. I must investigate.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Laetin A'shera: <Pilot, there's a vessel among the incoming mining ships that isn't responding to our friendly hails. We suspect that this may be the Black Sun spy our intelligence agency warned us about. Check it out and be careful.>
entries.title: Black Sun Infiltration: Secure the Lucent Ivaya
entries.title_d: 'Laetin A'shera is concerned that a Black Sun spy has found its way into a fleet of incoming mining ships. It is hard to identify and must be investigated by a pilot. I was recruited for the cause. It's good to be in open space again and the scenery of Ord Mantell has always been soothing. I'll be patrolling until the fleet arrives. Soon, we'll find out if Laetin was right.'
